{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Beachcombing {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Beachcombing Beachcombing is an activity that consists of an individual "combing" (or searching) the beach and the intertidal zone, looking for things of value, interest or utility. A beachcomber is a person who participates in the activity of beachcombing. Despite these general definitions, beachcombing and beachcomber are words with multiple, but related, meanings that have evolved over time. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beachcombing)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
